CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 一天；一日；白天；白昼；日间；工作日；每天工作的时间；年代；时代；时期；节日；特别的日子；重要的日子；年轻时期；鼎盛时期；战斗；比赛；胜利；（days）一生；生命；（Day）戴（人名）；达伊（人名）
白昼的；日间的；日间工作的；上白班的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 泛指任何一天，或指含有“一昼夜”意义的一天，也可指工作日。可用复数表时代、时期。
指具体的年、月、日，或指年代、时代。

word_group.brief_definition: 那时；当时；在那些日子里

bilingual.source: It was a bad day but also a good day!
bilingual.target: 这是糟糕的一天，但也是美好的一天！

bilingual.source: Day by day, I learnt to trust people.
bilingual.target: 一天天地，我学会了信任别人。

bilingual.source: A day without laughter is a wasted day.
bilingual.target: 没有笑声的一天是浪费的一天。

list.abstract: day是一个英语单词，可以用作名词、形容词，可以翻译为一天、白天等等。复数为days。

yingyinNormal.en: We've all had bad days, but we learn, and we stick together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都有过不顺心的时候，但总能学着生存，而且非常团结。

yingyinNormal.en: Was a day? It was a day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这一天你忙坏了吧？是啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Hell of a first day, Greenie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 疯狂的第一天，伙计。

yingyinNormal.en: Because it was a beautiful day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为那是…那是美丽的一天。

yingyinNormal.en: All day long. Five days a week.
yingyinNormal.zh: 周一到周五，一天24小时。

yingyinNormal.en: One day, the legend will be born.
yingyinNormal.zh: 终有一天，传奇将至。

yingyinNormal.en: Then one day, I saw you set down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 突然有一天，你出现了。

yingyinNormal.en: Let this day mark an historic change.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让今天成为历史性的一天。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm a bit tired. It's been a long day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有点困了，累了一天了。

yingyinNormal.en: Will you rent me your gear for the day?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的枪能租给我用一天吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I realize now that day will never come.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在看来那一天是不会来了。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, this is the greatest day of my life!
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，这是我生命中最美好的一天。

yingyinNormal.en: What happened that day was not my fault.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那一天会发生什么又不是我的错。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm on the one-a-day Fruity Pebbles plan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有个一天一包水果卵石[早餐品牌]计划。

yingyinNormal.en: The simple life. You'll get there one day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 简朴的生活。总有一天，你也会如愿的。

yingyinNormal.en: God, what a great day! What? Weather-wise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 多美好的一天啊。什么？我是指天气。

yingyinNormal.en: So, come on, how was the first day with Hawking?
yingyinNormal.zh: 说吧，跟霍金度过的第一天感觉如何？

yingyinNormal.en: Every day I was a prisoner, I plotted my escape.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我当俘虏的每一天，都在计划如何逃回来。

yingyinNormal.en: Then one day, you saw something amazing. Muddy puddle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后有一天，你看见一些很神奇的东西。泥坑。

yingyinNormal.en: You taking money from Roderick Realty? Have a nice day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你拿了罗德里克地产的钱？祝你一天愉快。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 假期；节假日；暂缓缴付期；（Holiday）人名：霍利戴
adj. 每日的；每周日的；一天的
n. 日光；知觉；神智；破晓；距离；天明；晨曦；空隙

word_family.mean: n. 一天；时期；时代；（Day）人名：戴

examination_example.sentence: There is also a growing body of evidence that diet-induced cognitive impairments can emerge rapidly—within weeks or even <highlight>days</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 越来越多的证据表明，饮食导致的认知障碍会在几周甚至几天内迅速出现。

examination_example.sentence: Brookdale, the country's largest owner of retirement communities, has been inviting a few select entrepreneurs just to move in for a few <highlight>days</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该国最大的退休社区所有者Brookdale已经邀请了一些精选的企业家入住几天。

examination_example.sentence: Decision fatigue is a psychological phenomenon that takes a toll on the quality of your choices after a long <highlight>day</highlight> of decision making.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 决策疲劳是一种心理现象，在做了一整天的决策后，会对你的选择质量造成影响。

examination_example.sentence: Our own decision-making abilities can become depleted over the course of the <highlight>day</highlight> causing indecision or poor choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们自己的决策能力可能会在一天中耗尽，导致优柔寡断或糟糕的选择。

examination_example.sentence: These designers established the modern dress code, in contradiction to dressing for an occasion or allotment of the <highlight>day</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些设计师制定了现代着装规范，与为某一场合或某一天的分配而着装相矛盾。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists have proven that despite their poorly developed small eyes, these bats still can see during the <highlight>day</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们已经证明，尽管它们的小眼睛发育不良，这些蝙蝠仍然可以在白天看到东西。

examination_example.sentence: She examined the books housed in the kindergarten rooms of four <highlight>day</highlight>-care centers in Western Australia.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她检查了存放在西澳大利亚四个日托中心的幼儿园房间里的书籍。

examination_example.sentence: Ever since America's colonial <highlight>days</highlight>, the Caribbean islands have been favorite places to visit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自从美国殖民时期以来，加勒比群岛一直是人们最喜欢去的地方。

examination_example.sentence: Initially, this was wireless Morse code telegraphy (电讯通报), the principal communication technology of his <highlight>day</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最初，这是无线摩斯密码电报，是他当时的主要通信技术。

examination_example.sentence: Marconi was central to our present-<highlight>day</highlight> understanding of communication.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 马可尼对我们当今的对于交流的理解至关重要。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指具体的年、月、日, 或指年代、时代。
泛指任何一天, 或指含有"一昼夜"意义的一天, 也可指工作日。可用复数表时代、时期。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 假期；节假日；暂缓缴付期；（Holiday）人名：霍利戴
adj. 每日的；每周日的；一天的
n. 日光；知觉；神智；破晓；距离；天明；晨曦；空隙

word_family.mean: n. 一天；时期；时代；（Day）人名：戴

examination_example.sentence: A balanced breakfast is really helpful, but getting regular meals throughout the <highlight>day</highlight> is more important to leave blood sugar stable through the <highlight>day</highlight>, which helps control weight and hunger levels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 均衡的早餐真的很有帮助，但一整天的规律饮食，对保持全天血糖稳定更重要，而且有助于控制体重和饥饿水平。

examination_example.sentence: One of the most well-worn phrases of tired parents everywhere is that breakfast is the most important meal of the <highlight>day</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 天下疲惫不堪的父母说得最多的一句话，就是早餐是一天当中最重要的一餐了。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Days</highlight> fare the deadly 2017 wildfires in Santa Rosa, Californian, a drone (无人机) caught footage (连续镜头) of a USPS worker, Trevor Smith, driving through boomed homes in that familiar white van, collecting mail in an affected area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在加州圣罗莎市2017年那场致命的野火发生后的几天，一架无人机捕捉到了美国邮政局工作人员特雷弗·史密斯驾驶着那辆熟悉的白色面包车穿过熙熙攘攘的住宅区，在受灾地区收集邮件的镜头。

examination_example.sentence: High-protein breakfasts have been found particularly effective in reducing the longing for food and consumption later in the <highlight>day</highlight>, according to research by the Australian Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 澳大利亚的联邦科学与工业研究组织的研究发现，蛋白质含量丰富的早餐，对于降低当天随后时间的食欲及减少食物摄取量，特别有效。

examination_example.sentence: Those who made breakfast the largest meal of the <highlight>day</highlight> were more likely to have a lower body mass index (BMI) than those who ate a large lunch or dinner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与吃了大量午餐或晚餐的人相比，那些把早餐作为一天中最f丰盛一餐的人更有可能拥有较低的身体质量指数(BMI)。

examination_example.sentence: One <highlight>day</highlight> we'll see Venice break down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总有一天我们会看到威尼斯崩溃。

examination_example.sentence: Davida Herzl, Aclima's boss, says they have revealed pollution highs on <highlight>days</highlight> when San Francisco's transit workers went on strike and the city's inhabitants were forced to use their cars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Aclima 的老板 Davida Herzl 表示，他们发现旧金山的运输工人罢工，城市居民被迫开汽车时，空气污染达到了高峰。

examination_example.sentence: On this <highlight>day</highlight>, there was a twist: it was filled with Venetians, not tourists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这一天，事情发生了变化：这里挤满了威尼斯人，而不是游客。

examination_example.sentence: Rural kids used to walk a long way to school in the old <highlight>days</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以前，农村孩子上学要走很长一段路。

examination_example.sentence: They consume less milk these <highlight>days</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近期，他们摄入的牛奶更少了。

examination_example.sentence: Young people do less cooking at home than the elderly these <highlight>days</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在年轻人在家做饭比老年人少。

examination_example.sentence: This summer, Wilson Wong will lead a class of rising fifth-graders at a <highlight>day</highlight> camp dedicated to Chinese culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年夏天，威尔逊·黄将带领一个五年级新生班级参加一个以中国文化为主题的日间夏令营。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指具体的年、月、日，或指年代、时代。
泛指任何一天，或指含有"一昼夜"意义的一天，也可指工作日。可用复数表时代、时期。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 日复一日(表示动作或状态的重复)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 假期；节假日；暂缓缴付期；（Holiday）人名：霍利戴
adj. 每日的；每周日的；一天的
n. 日光；知觉；神智；破晓；距离；天明；晨曦；空隙

word_family.mean: n. 一天；时期；时代；（Day）人名：戴

examination_example.sentence: You will feel energized all <highlight>day</highlight> long.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你会一整天都感到精力充沛。

examination_example.sentence: Every <highlight>day</highlight> he makes sure that fresh vegetables and high quality oil are used for cooking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他每天都确保用新鲜的蔬菜和高质量的油来烹饪。

examination_example.sentence: Have a nice <highlight>day</highlight>!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 祝你今天愉快！

examination_example.sentence: After six <highlight>days</highlight>, it is wise to take a <highlight>day</highlight> off to rest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 六天后，放假休息一天是明智之举。

examination_example.sentence: By <highlight>day</highlight>, Robert Titterton is a lawyer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 白天，Robert Titterton是一名律师。

examination_example.sentence: When you sleep, your brain sorts through everything that happened during the <highlight>day</highlight>, trying to link new experiences to old memories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你睡觉时，你的大脑会整理白天发生的一切，试图将新的经历与旧的记忆联系起来。

examination_example.sentence: As they grew more mobile, we let them move freely around the house during the <highlight>day</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着它们的活动能力越来越强，白天，我们就让它们在房子里自由地走动。

examination_example.sentence: People have been pouring into stadiums since the <highlight>days</highlight> of ancient Greece.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从古希腊时代起，人们就开始涌入体育场馆。

examination_example.sentence: Even soccer fans tend to have a seat each; gone are the <highlight>days</highlight> of thousands standing to watch the match.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即便是球迷也有座位；成千上万人站着看比赛的时代结束了。

examination_example.sentence: I used classical techniques, translated from my college <highlight>days</highlight> spent in the darkroom into Photoshop, to achieve the black-and-white image (图像).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我使用了经典的摄影技术，把我大学期间在暗室里冲洗的底片，导入Photoshop，得到了黑白图像。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指具体的年、月、日，或指年代、时代。
泛指任何一天，或指含有"一昼夜"意义的一天，也可指工作日。可用复数表时代、时期。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 假期；节假日；暂缓缴付期；（Holiday）人名：霍利戴
adj. 每日的；每周日的；一天的

word_family.mean: n. 一天；时期；时代；（Day）人名：戴

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 那时；当时；在那些日子里

examination_example.sentence: Encouraging  words help sad people make it through the <highlight>day</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鼓励的话帮助悲伤的人度过一天。

examination_example.sentence: We started in England and we spent two <highlight>days</highlight> in London and another day in Canterbury．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们从英国开始，在伦敦呆了两天，在坎特伯雷又呆了一天。

examination_example.sentence: Maybe you can’t help playing with your smart phones all <highlight>day</highlight> while you are on holiday alone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许当你独自度假时，你整天都忍不住玩你的智能手机。
